Hungry Square

By: Jaden Wilson

How to play:
You will start off as a square, get all food also known as green circles. The more green circles you eat the bigger you get.
There will be a score of how many circles you collect, the higher the score the better.

Controls:
The square will follow your mouse
Go on top of the green circles to collect them

Bug report: my game does not collect the circles. there is no score in my game. there also is no randomized spawns.
